item.title: Phenotypes related to psychiatry and or sleep
item.description: Overall A strong link appears to exist with both sleep and mood Multiple papers suggested that impacting sleep may be the causal pathway for impact on mood Majority of studies focus on correlation and not causality Impact on sleep seems to be mainly by : Inducing awakening Changing the amount of tim...

item.title: MnR from the Bristol Training files
item.description: What is Mendelian Randomization Mendelian Randomization is a powerful technique that uses genetics as a tool to ask, “Does X cause Y?” — helping uncover true causal relationships in human biology.

item.title: FMR1 and CGG triplet repeats
item.description: The FMR1 Gene FMR1 stands for Fragile X Mental Retardation 1 gene. It’s located on the X chromosome (Xq27.3).
